summary:
Where better place to spend your hard earned/stolen coin? ........... the pub ! And heres some nice Irish tunes for while you do it.

Sl√°inte!
descriptionHtml:
First go at editing here, i thought a few irish tunes would fit in really well as tavern background music and i think they work really well.

All the songs are instrumental only, mixture of fiddle, bodrhan and mandolin.

Heres is a sample to one of the tunes..... {but i do recommend you just wait til in game;}
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wp8C3JUUxHE&feature=related

Any feedback at all is welcome.


UPDATED
----------

Added another file, this time its all Irish tunes done on the flute, and again keeping it lore friendly.


Enjoy :]

Other mods you may like.....
Irish gold by JosephMelia - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1666
Irish flute bard by Cromanon- http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5665
Tartan guards by Callaghan04 - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3359
author: jinky67
